snippet: A judge in Kirkland, Wash., released the former Seattle Seahawks tight end Jerramy Stevens, saying there was no evidence connecting Stevens to any assault.
abstract: Judge in Kirkland, Wash, releases former NFL tight end Jerramy Stevens, citing lack of evidence that he assaulted United States women’s soccer team goalkeeper Hope Solo day before their planned wedding.
lead_paragraph: A judge in Kirkland, Wash., released the former Seattle Seahawks tight end Jerramy Stevens, saying there was no evidence connecting Stevens to any assault.

headline.seo: No Assault Case Against Former Seahawks’ Jerramy Stevens
headline.main: No Assault Case Against Former Seahawks Tight End
